name: Doomspawn: I Evolve to Ultimate Therianthrope
author: 萌月文化
content: In the wake of the apocalyptic Red Mist, Caleb O’Dea’s world is reduced to two truths: his family is dead, and his sister is missing. His quest for vengeance and answers leads him to the front lines of humanity’s final stand. But Caleb is a living weapon, harboring a power born of the same source as the invading horrors. To fight them, he must become like them—devouring beasts to steal their abilities, evolving into a stronger, more monstrous version of himself with every battle. This is his sac
